Context: The Transitions to Post-secondary Education (TPE) program is a free college program for adults who want to return to school and face barriers related to mental health or substance use. The deadline to apply for Winter 2024 admission is April 9th, 2023. Applications must be completed in person at George Brown College after attending a mandatory information session. For more details and to sign up for updates, contact 416-415-2000 or ask.george@georgebrown.ca. The program has a TTY number: 1-877-515-5559. More information can be found on their social media hub. Please note that the information contained in this website is subject to change without notice.
